text:
@GavinNewsom I have a few Qs.... #Help

How do you get an autistic young adult to wear a mask? 

How do you prevent seniors with dementia onset from being harassed & attacked by mask shakers?

If the masks work, why can’t the people?

#COVID19 #Coronavirus
